process.title: How We Work
process.subtitle: 6 simple steps from idea to your own sea

step1.title: Application
step1.text: You submit an application on the website or call us. We will contact you within 30 minutes.

step2.title: Specialist visit
step2.text: Free measurement and consultation on site. Assessment of conditions and possibilities.

step3.title: Design
step3.text: Development of a 3D project, technical documentation and a detailed estimate.

step4.title: Preparation
step4.text: Procurement of materials and equipment, preparation of the construction site.

step5.title: Construction
step5.text: Execution of work with regular photo reports at each stage of construction.

step6.title: Handover
step6.text: Final inspection, operation training, 5-year warranty registration.

team.title: Our Team
team.text: 50+ full-time employees. Experienced professionals who have been trained at leading European companies. Every member of our team is a master of their craft who takes a responsible approach to every project.

reviews.title: Client Reviews

r1.text: I am very satisfied with the cooperation with this company, their professionalism and attention to detail exceeded all my expectations, the pool installation went quickly and without problems, thanks to which I now enjoy my new relaxation spot. I recommend this company to everyone!

r2.author: Nazar Podoliaka
r2.text: Today I visited «Svoe More», I was pleasantly surprised!!! I received answers to all my questions, professional consultation and valuable advice. Sincerely grateful to consultant Semen for the service! Loyal prices, wide assortment, friendly staff!!! I recommend to everyone!

r3.author: Oleksandr
r3.text: First time I contacted this company regarding the maintenance of my pool. I was very satisfied with the professionalism of the staff and the wide range of products.

r4.text: Have been a client for several years, the service is top-notch, keep it up!

reviews.disclaimer: Reviews from the Google profile of the «SVOE MORE» branded store/showroom. Some reviews are about consultations and service, others about installation/construction.
